statement: B. Lucky Numbers (easy)time limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstdinoutputstdoutPetya loves lucky numbers. Given a positive integer $n$, find the smallest super lucky number that is greater than or equal to $n$. 

A super lucky number is a positive integer that has an equal number of digits 4 and 7.
Find the smallest number greater than or equal to a given number that has an equal number of 4s and 7s in its digits.
